Liverpool transfer news: Jurgen Klopp gives up on Nabil Fekir to focus on Norwich wonderkids James Maddison.

Liverpool had two bids knocked back from Lyon to sign the France international in the summer.

The player is said to have set his heart on a move to Anfield, but Lyon are refusing to drop their £75million valuation.

And the Sunday Mirror claim Liverpool are not prepared to pay that much for the 24-year-old.

Instead, Liverpool will reportedly turn their attention to fellow Norwich James Maddison.

Liverpool transfer news: Jurgen Klopp gives up on Nabil Fekir to focus on Norwich wonderkids James Maddison.

Liverpool had two bids knocked back from Lyon to sign the France international in the summer.

The player is said to have set his heart on a move to Anfield, but Lyon are refusing to drop their £75million valuation.

And the Sunday Mirror claim Liverpool are not prepared to pay that much for the 24-year-old.

Instead, Liverpool will reportedly turn their attention to fellow Norwich James Maddison.
